Info.name: Trung Hieu
Info.bio: Explore the portfolio of Trung Hieu, a dynamic innovator blending artistry and technology at the heart of digital design. Hieu is dedicated to crafting intuitive, impactful user experiences that seamlessly combine creative vision with technical precision.

Projects.searchPlaceholder: Search projects by title or filter by category

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.message: Thank you for exploring my work! I'm excited to connect with you. Whether you have a project in mind, want to collaborate, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out.
Contact.name: Duong Trung Hieu
